3rd Party Synd. Remarks: NEW REDUCED PRICE!! Seller has listed this property for rent, first come first serve. Take a step back in time into San Francisco's historic Marina Chateau! The fabulous embellished lobby will take your breath away. With CATHEDRAL CEILINGS and intricate original detailing, this building is a historic landmark. This highly coveted corner unit condo is a HUGE 1 bedroom 1 bath, which features a separate dining room plus an EXTRAORDINARILY large living room with a closet that other units use as a 2nd bedroom. With views of the Golden Gate Bridge from the primary bedroom, dining room, and from the breathtaking shared rooftop deck, this property is a stunner. You will be inspired by the original bathroom tile, wood floors, crown molding, and light fixtures. The hallways and elevators will transport you to the SF roaring 20's as you continue through the ornate hallways and curved wooden doorways. This building is as unique as San Francisco itself, and is situated in the highly desirable Marina District. Walking distance to some of San Francisco's most coveted attractions, Fort Mason, Ghirardelli Square, Fisherman's Warf, and Union Street, this condo has it all AND is FLOODED with natural
Confidential Remarks: Please Listing Agent for a showings. Cell phone (714)595-1260 This property is being sold as a 1031 exchange.

Public Remarks: NEW REDUCED PRICE!! Seller has listed this property for rent, first come first serve. Take a step back in time into San Francisco's historic Marina Chateau! The fabulous embellished lobby will take your breath away. With CATHEDRAL CEILINGS and intricate original detailing, this building is a historic landmark. This highly coveted corner unit condo is a HUGE 1 bedroom 1 bath, which features a separate dining room plus an EXTRAORDINARILY large living room with a closet that other units use as a 2nd bedroom. With views of the Golden Gate Bridge from the primary bedroom, dining room, and from the breathtaking shared rooftop deck, this property is a stunner. You will be inspired by the original bathroom tile, wood floors, crown molding, and light fixtures. The hallways and elevators will transport you to the SF roaring 20's as you continue through the ornate hallways and curved wooden doorways. This building is as unique as San Francisco itself, and is situated in the highly desirable Marina District. Walking distance to some of San Francisco's most coveted attractions, Fort Mason, Ghirardelli Square, Fisherman's Warf, and Union Street, this condo has it all AND is FLOODED with natural light from windows that are fitted with custom Levolor blinds.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Imagine the San Francisco home of your dreams. It's here in the iconic Marina Chateau, with panoramic views of the Golden Gate Bridge. This enchanting corner condominium has classic architectural details including hardwood floors, crown moldings, wood paneled doors and arched doorways, as well as exquisitely curated light fixtures. Bay windows in the living room and dining room frame picture-perfect views and golden sunsets from the Palace of Fine Arts to the Marin Headlands, while bookcases in the beamed ceiling dining room also afford options for a library or home office. The European style kitchen has glass front cabinets, tile backsplash, a gas range and ample storage in the butler's pantry area. The spacious corner bedroom is flooded with light and has triple-paned windows for quiet serenity. There is ample closet space throughout, including a large closet in the charming bathroom. Art collectors will appreciate the gallery entry hall, and generous amount of wall space. 1-car parking and additional storage. The Marina Chateau is an elevator building known for its impressive Spanish Mediterranean lobby. The wind-protected common roof deck also has stunning views of the Golden G
Confidential Remarks: One-of-a-kind magical property with panoramic views. Truly special. Owner occupied, so allow notice for showings away from open houses and broker tours. Call or text Marsha at (415) 533-1894
Public Remarks: Imagine the San Francisco home of your dreams. It's here in the iconic Marina Chateau, with panoramic views of the Golden Gate Bridge. This enchanting corner condominium has classic architectural details including hardwood floors, crown moldings, wood paneled doors and arched doorways, as well as exquisitely curated light fixtures. Bay windows in the living room and dining room frame picture-perfect views and golden sunsets from the Palace of Fine Arts to the Marin Headlands, while bookcases in the beamed ceiling dining room also afford options for a library or home office. The European style kitchen has glass front cabinets, tile backsplash, a gas range and ample storage in the butler's pantry area. The spacious corner bedroom is flooded with light and has triple-paned windows for quiet serenity. There is ample closet space throughout, including a large closet in the charming bathroom. Art collectors will appreciate the gallery entry hall, and generous amount of wall space. 1-car parking and additional storage. The Marina Chateau is an elevator building known for its impressive Spanish Mediterranean lobby. The wind-protected common roof deck also has stunning views of the Golden Gate Bridge. Ideal Cow Hollow location, close to shops, restaurants, parks and transportation.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: The Belvedere, designed by world-renowned Handel Architects, is a culmination of elevated architectural design, tailor-made shared spaces, and 28 brand-new refined homes gracing San Francisco's prestigious Cow Hollow neighborhood. A concrete and steel structure built in 2024, The Belvedere features an exquisite, attended lobby, and incredible views captured from the two and three-bedroom homes spread across seven spacious levels. Crowning The Belvedere is an expansive, 6,200 sqft resort-style roof terrace with picture perfect views of the Golden Gate Bridge and San Francisco's most notable hills. The elegant kitchens include Miele appliances and gorgeous Gabana Quartzite stone, while the spa-like bathrooms are equipped with Waterworks fixtures and adorned in imported Calacatta stone. Additional features include: air conditioning, add'l storage available, and bicycle parking. Residence 304 is a 2 bed/2.5 bath 1,353 sqft home with a spacious great room with a formal dining area. The Belvedere is in a fantastic walking area, with the bustling shops, restaurants, and cafes of Union St in Cow Hollow right outside your door. Russian Hill, Pacific Heights, and The Marina are all just minutes away. Optional parking available for additional fee. Photos are of a similar unit.
Confidential Remarks: Showings by appointment only, no open houses. Contact Frank Nolan for showings and DRE purchase agreement, 415.377.3726, frank@vanguardsf.com. www.belvederesf.com
Directions to Property: Van Ness Ave, between Union & Filbert.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Large and beautiful corner end-unit with formal dining room and parking at the iconic Marina Chateau. Located on the quiet Greenwich side of the building, this elegant home has views to the tree-lined street and west to the Presidio. Rich period details include high ceilings, arched doorways and crown moldings. The kitchen and bath have been updated, and the kitchen has stainless appliances including a gas range. The gracious formal dining room has a stunning Venetian chandelier. Hardwood floors throughout. Spacious bedroom has outlooks to a beautiful flowering tree, walk-in closet and double-paned windows. Large closets provide ample storage. 1-car garage parking and bike storage. The Marina Chateau has a wind-protected common area roof deck with panoramic views of the Golden Gate Bridge. Excellent Cow Hollow location in walking distance to Union Street, Polk Street and the Marina. Dog friendly building close to Ft. Mason and the new Francisco Park.
Confidential Remarks: Please allow some notice for showings. Call or text Marsha at (415) 533-1894.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Studio Below Market Rate (BMR) housing opportunity available at 120% Area Median Income (AMI). Maximum income for 1 person = $121,000; 2 = $138,350; 3 = $155,650, etc. Must be 1st-time homebuyer & income eligible. Unit available thru the Mayor's Office of Housing and Community Development (MOHCD) & subject to resale controls, monitoring & other restrictions. Unit will be listed on DAHLIA, the SF Housing Portal (https://housing.sfgov.org) starting on the application date, 6-9-2023. Visit https://housing.sfgov.org for application & program info. Application, loan pre-approval, and homebuyer education verification due on 6-30-2023. Fair Housing Opportunity.
Confidential Remarks: Contact Rob 415-317-8540 rob.belli@compass.com for more info.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This quiet and serene Golden Gate Bridge view penthouse crowns the coveted Marina Chateau. It pairs 1920's stateliness with gorgeous renovations of the kitchen and baths. The formal entry gives a hint of what's to come. You enter the open plan living, dining and kitchen. A bank of windows offering panoramic Golden Gate Bridge views flood the room with bright natural light. This dramatic space is accentuated by soaring ten-foot ceilings, and the modern open plan is ideal for entertaining. The beautiful custom kitchen has new professional grade appliances and island. The dining area chandelier defines the space which flows seamlessly into the living room area. The entire room has ever changing views of the bridge and bay. The secluded primary suite, with a walk-in closet, also has views of the Golden Gate. The spa-like bath with marble floor tile has a walk in shower. The remodeled second full bath is located off the living space, and is easily accessed from the two additional bedrooms. One has a coffered ceiling and an urban view. The other bedroom has views from the Golden Gate to Russian Hill. The separate office completes this dream condo. One floor up is the shared roof deck wit
Public Remarks: This quiet and serene Golden Gate Bridge view penthouse crowns the coveted Marina Chateau. It pairs 1920's stateliness with gorgeous renovations of the kitchen and baths. The formal entry gives a hint of what's to come. You enter the open plan living, dining and kitchen. A bank of windows offering panoramic Golden Gate Bridge views flood the room with bright natural light. This dramatic space is accentuated by soaring ten-foot ceilings, and the modern open plan is ideal for entertaining. The beautiful custom kitchen has new professional grade appliances and island. The dining area chandelier defines the space which flows seamlessly into the living room area. The entire room has ever changing views of the bridge and bay. The secluded primary suite, with a walk-in closet, also has views of the Golden Gate. The spa-like bath with marble floor tile has a walk in shower. The remodeled second full bath is located off the living space, and is easily accessed from the two additional bedrooms. One has a coffered ceiling and an urban view. The other bedroom has views from the Golden Gate to Russian Hill. The separate office completes this dream condo. One floor up is the shared roof deck with panoramic views. Two parking spaces, and a storage room are exclusive to the unit. 99 walk score!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Luxury meets location at this boutique Cow Hollow residence. Intelligent design provide comforts like A/C, a smart thermostat, superior appliances, and an in-unit W/D. Wide plank engineered oak floors add warmth to the living areas and a walk-in closet compliments the Primary BR. Custom finishes like Hunter Douglas shades and integrated speakers complete the interior. 2-car parking and a private storage room await your use. This home provides many conveniences and does not share ANY walls with neighbors making its location in the complex highly desirable. The complex, known as The Greenwich, is enriched with quality amenities including EV charging and a two-level outdoor courtyard. The reserves are very strong and fiber-optic internet powers connectivity. Driving is stress-free with quick access to the main thoroughfares and walkability is superb: The Greenwich is situated only 2 blocks from both Chestnut St and Union St and Polk St is only one block away. Don't miss this elegant offering.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience the ultimate SF lifestyle at the iconic Marina Chateau. Step inside this Spanish Mediterranean style gem, where modern comforts blend seamlessly with vintage charm. High ceilings, arched doorways, vintage tile bathroom & generous living areas create a chic canvas for you to make your own. This spacious condo has a versatile layout to create a 2nd bedroom &/or home office. The sun-drenched living room enjoys views of Russian Hill. Galley style kitchen features sleek quartz countertops, gas range & plenty of pantry space. Off the kitchen is a formal dining room perfect for hosting. Storage is abundant with 4 roomy closets in the unit. Take your entertaining game up a notch on the wind protected roof deck with breathtaking bridge & bay views - the ultimate setting for your fleet week party. Situated at the junction of Cow Hollow, Marina & Russian Hill, this location is a dream come true. 99 walk score & steps from countless shops, restaurants, & other world class amenities. Minutes from Fort Mason, Marina Green & the waterfront. The bridge is minutes away for that spontaneous weekend getaway. Easy access to 101 with ~25 minute drive to SFO airport. Add'l perks include wood
Confidential Remarks: Offers to be submitted on SFAR Purchase Agreement. For questions text/email Carter: 415-275-0229 or carter@readdress.com. Disclosures can be downloaded here: https://app.disclosures.io/link/2701-Van-Ness-Avenue-301-ouj2fg5c. Pre-escrow opened with Heather Shiffer of First American Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Presenting The Greenwich, an exquisite boutique elevator building nestled in the lively neighborhood of Cow Hollow. This charming and elegant two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium boasts a sunlit and open plan kitchen, dining, and living room area. The tastefully designed common spaces include a welcoming lobby with Travertine floors, a serene landscaped garden, and a delightful patio featuring a BBQ and dining area. Additional perks include secure bike storage, a video security system for building entry, and expert professional management. With an outstanding Walk Score of 99, residents can easily explore the nearby vibrant streets like Polk, Union, Fillmore, Hyde, and Chestnut, each brimming with a plethora of shops, restaurants, and amenities. Nature lovers will also find solace in the proximity to Lafayette Park, Alta Plaza, and other green spaces, perfect for leisurely strolls and relaxation. Cow Hollow's thriving ambiance seamlessly connects to The Marina, Fort Mason, Pacific Heights, Ghirardelli Square, North Beach, and the recently-built Russian Hill Park, offering breathtaking views. Whether it's a leisurely stroll or an evening out, everything is within reach from this ho
Public Remarks: Presenting The Greenwich, an exquisite boutique elevator building nestled in the lively neighborhood of Cow Hollow. This charming and elegant two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium boasts a sunlit and open plan kitchen, dining, and living room area. The tastefully designed common spaces include a welcoming lobby with Travertine floors, a serene landscaped garden, and a delightful patio featuring a BBQ and dining area. Additional perks include secure bike storage, a video security system for building entry, and expert professional management. With an outstanding Walk Score of 99, residents can easily explore the nearby vibrant streets like Polk, Union, Fillmore, Hyde, and Chestnut, each brimming with a plethora of shops, restaurants, and amenities. Nature lovers will also find solace in the proximity to Lafayette Park, Alta Plaza, and other green spaces, perfect for leisurely strolls and relaxation. Cow Hollow's thriving ambiance seamlessly connects to The Marina, Fort Mason, Pacific Heights, Ghirardelli Square, North Beach, and the recently-built Russian Hill Park, offering breathtaking views. Whether it's a leisurely stroll or an evening out, everything is within reach from this home's doorstep.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Imagine yourself in this corner unit with exceptional walkability in the relative flats of Cow Hollow. The open kitchen connects to the living/dining great room. Floor-to-ceiling windows wrap around the north and eastern walls for all day light. Private balcony. Hardwood floors throughout, and wall-to-wall carpeting in the bedrooms. The primary suite has dual sinks, a deep soaking tub, and a walk-in closet finished by California Closets. Second bedroom has adjacent full bathroom, and could function as an excellent home office. Underground garage with one parking space, electric car charger included (installed by seller), and large storage locker. HOA includes fantastic rooftop with outdoor grills, fire features, tables, and A+ views. Building completed in 2014. Original owner. The 4th floor is shared with only two other units. Come see why this is the intersection of modernity, luxury, and accessibility.
Confidential Remarks: Appointment only. Agent will give access. Please contact Scott to set appointment - 415.419.4510. Front door is on Filbert. Street parking only for all showings. Please do not block driveway. All appliances convey. 1 parking space plus separate storage locker. Agent is related to seller. HOA permits rentals if lease term is for 6 months or longer. Square footage is based on original plans; Floor Plan Visuals calculated more at 1,195; buyer to assess.
